text: - My name is Tal Kollender,
I'm the co-founder and the CEO for GYTPOL.

The Gen AI has some
advantages and disadvantages,
especially in the cybersecurity field.
You need always to know the balance.

Sometimes it can help you,
but you need to be aware
that it won't fail you.

When you really want to do
things and to improve your,

the skills, the employees,
you can definitely use it,

but also be aware that
if you really want it
to automate something for you,
you need to think twice before doing it.
So that's why I would say,

I mean, respect it, but again,
definitely double check it.

The general public, they
believe too much in the Gen AI.

And one of the problems that
once you believe too much

in the Gen AI, this is
where you can be fooled.

And this is where when
you trust it too much.
I mean, you don't know what is the truth,
what is the source of truth
that you can really believe in anymore.
And that is one of the biggest problem

that the general public
is having right now.
AWS is supporting so many startups

in the Gen AI journey,
and the reason is simple.
They are part of such a big ecosystem.

They know their customers,
they know their needs.
And this is one of the things
that we really, really love in AWS,

that they know exactly
to identify a problem

and then to make a solution
and then to make it work.
AWS helps GYTPOL to be more innovative,
scalable, and agile.
(upbeat music)
